bug.author: tordsae
bug.summary: Output 0 of type variant does not match declared output type int64 for node node IteratorGetNext
bug.description:
Please make sure that this is a bug. As per our GitHub Policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests and build/installation issues on GitHub. tag:bug_template System information
Standard setup for gcp kubeflow and notebook as in https://www.tensorflow.org/tfx/tutorials/tfx/cloud-ai-platform-pipelines
Trying a pipeline with keras model to estimator method. Similar to the one in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/blob/r0.21/tfx/examples/iris/iris_utils.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/blob/r0.21/tfx/examples/iris/iris_utils.py</denchmark-link> , but for a simple autoencoder for 1 feature.
When the pipeline tries to save checkpoint I get the error: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/blob/r0.21/tfx/examples/iris/iris_utils.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/blob/r0.21/tfx/examples/iris/iris_utils.py</denchmark-link>
Output 0 of type variant does not match declared output type int64 for node node IteratorGetNext

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tordsae>@tordsae</denchmark-link> , This issue is more related to TFX, can you raise this issue in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/issues>TFX</denchmark-link> repository. Thanks!

Are you satisfied with the resolution of your issue? <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=Yes&entry.2137816233=https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/37600>Yes</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=No&entry.2137816233=https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/37600>No</denchmark-link>
